caller_intent: Kathy is calling to set up an auto draft for an insurance policy with Progressive, providing banking details and confirming policy information.
resolution_steps: Jeff collects the routing number (054000030) and account number (5341997315) for PNC Bank under Big Dog Auto Salvage LLC.
Confirms the business name, contact number (406-571-7), and email (BigDogAutoSalvage@gmail.com).
Informs Kathy about the Progressive auto policy setup, effective September 23rd, and the first payment of ~$167.
Explains the e-sign process via Conga Sign and provides next steps for policy activation.
knowledge_required: Policy effective dates and payment schedules
summary: Kathy coordinates with Jeff to set up automatic payments for a Progressive auto insurance policy, providing banking details and confirming policy terms. Jeff explains the e-sign process via Conga Sign and confirms the policy will take effect September 23rd. The call concludes with mutual agreement to proceed and follow-up instructions.
